last_episode_to_air.name: Friday Night Vibe
last_episode_to_air.overview: Torin prepares for the return of Friday Night Vibe; Kandi and Todd sit down with Phillip to discuss his future at OLG; Shawndreca drops a bomb that gets an unexpected employee fired; Patrick plans a grand romantic gesture for Safari.

name: Kandi & The Gang
overview: Life is about to get a little sweeter — and, yes, a tad more dramatic — in a new series that follows Kandi Burruss' family and staff, who just so happen to work at her famed Old Lady Gang restaurant. Make your reservations: Kandi & The Gang.

episodes.name: Welcome to OLG
episodes.overview: Kandi and Todd's family restaurant was a huge success but after losing their general manager last year, the staff and the business hit a few bumps in the road; as Kandi and Todd bring in new leadership, the employees struggle to embrace the change.

episodes.name: Family Recipe for Disaster
episodes.overview: As Phillip continues to try to get OLG back in shape, Kandi tries to bring back the restaurant's glory and restore peace with her family, which results in an explosive moment.

episodes.name: Rowdy Employees & Uptight Managers
episodes.overview: Phillip’s struggle to manage the OLG staff continues as he bumps heads with Torin and Brian; Patrick invites the gang to his housewarming party, which may cause issues with the lady of the house; Brian opens up about his complicated past.

episodes.name: Spilling the OLG Tea
episodes.overview: Kandi and Todd call a town hall meeting to get the team back on track at OLG; Patrick jeopardizes his friendship with Torin; Dom’Unique and Brandon hit a new milestone in their relationship as Shawndreca gets put in the hot seat.

episodes.name: He Looks Like a Snitch
episodes.overview: Shawndreca begins her search for The Snitch, while Dom’Unique and Brandon decide their fate as a couple; Kandi and Todd hope a team building event will bring the gang back together; Brian’s future at OLG continues to hang in the Balance.

episodes.name: Too Many Tuckers in the Kitchen
episodes.overview: DonJuan receives news about Brian's sobriety. Kandi visits Safari amid growing concerns over her and Patrick’s relationship. Todd agrees to work a shift in the kitchen, but soon realizes he can't handle the heat. Shawndreca continues her mission to figure out who snitched on her. Dom’Unique and Brandon get caught up in their own workplace drama.

episodes.name: An Invitation Situation
episodes.overview: Torin preps for Patrick and Melvin’s housewarming. The OLGs battle over which dessert gets a spot on the menu. Dom and Brandon make their relationship public. An unexpected party guest gets turned away.

episodes.name: Exes Who Lunch
episodes.overview: Kandi and Todd attempt to mend the relationship between Patrick and Shawndreca for the sake of the restaurant. After the housewarming mix-up, Shawndreca reassesses about who are her true friends. Brian struggles to let go of part of his past. Patrick’s family questions Safari’s motives.

episodes.name: Big "Peau" Poppin
episodes.overview: The OLG staff take their side hustles to the next level as Patrick debuts his new oil line, Dom focuses on her dance career and Brian pitches a business plan to Todd; Phillip's past is exposed as Patrick takes the next step in his relationship.

episodes.name: Friday Night Vibe
episodes.overview: Torin prepares for the return of Friday Night Vibe; Kandi and Todd sit down with Phillip to discuss his future at OLG; Shawndreca drops a bomb that gets an unexpected employee fired; Patrick plans a grand romantic gesture for Safari.
